translate.english: open love / having an obvious crush

examples.example: 我对他是明恋，我会勇敢地表达我的爱意并努力追求自己的幸福。

translate.english: I have an open crush on him and I will bravely express my love and strive to pursue my own happiness.

examples.example: 她对他的明恋众人皆知，那纯粹而炽热的情感令人感动。

translate.english: Her obvious crush on him is known to everyone, and that pure and passionate emotion is touching.

examples.example: 在青春的时光中，她大胆地进行着明恋，那积极的态度让人欣赏。

translate.english: In the time of youth, she boldly carried out an open infatuation, and that positive attitude is appreciated.
